name: FineExtractionSchema
description: Extract key information from parking fines and traffic violation documents.

fields.name: FileName
fields.description: The name of the fine document file.

fields.name: FineDate
fields.description: The date when the fine was issued or the violation occurred.

fields.name: AmountToPay
fields.description: The monetary amount that needs to be paid for the fine.

fields.name: Currency
fields.description: The currency of the fine amount.

fields.name: LicensePlate
fields.description: The license plate number of the vehicle that received the fine.

fields.name: DueDate
fields.description: The due date for payment of the fine.

fields.name: FineNumber
fields.description: The unique identifier or reference number for the fine.

fields.name: ViolationType
fields.description: The type of violation that resulted in the fine.

fields.name: Location
fields.description: The location where the violation occurred (street address, intersection, etc.).

fields.name: IssuingAuthority
fields.description: The authority or organization that issued the fine (e.g., city parking authority, police department).

fields.name: PaymentInstructions
fields.description: Instructions on how to pay the fine (website, phone number, address).

fields.name: LateFee
fields.description: Additional fee charged if payment is made after the due date.
